name: part_011
file: tmp_【3D Live】Let My Voice Enchant You Tonight! #3DKobornDay2025 [jNCGOv8Zz1A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: Kobo Kanaeru announces her Birthday 2025 merchandise set.
Kobo thanks the audience and responds to encore requests.
Transition to the encore performance of 'Sweet Memories'.

subtitles.original: Birthday Set
subtitles.english: Birthday Set

subtitles.original: Princess!
subtitles.english: Princess!

subtitles.original: I've wanted to wear a jellyfish costume for a long time.
subtitles.english: I've wanted to wear a jellyfish costume for a long time.

subtitles.original: And finally, my wish came true!
subtitles.english: And finally, my wish came true!

subtitles.original: So, how is it, guys?
subtitles.english: So, how is it, guys?

subtitles.original: Do I look beautiful?
subtitles.english: Do I look beautiful?

subtitles.original: And the KV is drawn by Scotty-sensei.
subtitles.english: And the KV is drawn by Scotty-sensei.

subtitles.original: Scotty-sensei, arigato!
subtitles.english: Scotty-sensei, thank you!

subtitles.original: Arigato!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: And as you wish, guys...
subtitles.english: And as you wish, guys...

subtitles.original: Finally, ta-da!
subtitles.english: Finally, ta-da!

subtitles.original: Happi Bokoboko Your Kobo
subtitles.english: Happi Bokoboko Your Kobo

subtitles.original: Kobo-ker's Happi is here!
subtitles.english: Kobo-ker's Happi is here!

subtitles.original: Now you guys can be proud Kobo-kers...
subtitles.english: Now you guys can be proud Kobo-kers...

subtitles.original: ...and perfect for cheering me during events.
subtitles.english: ...and perfect for cheering me during events.

subtitles.original: Keren banget!
subtitles.english: So cool!

subtitles.original: Happi, happi, happi. Come on buy, happi, happi.
subtitles.english: Happi, happi, happi. Come on buy, happi, happi.

subtitles.original: And if you look closely, this Happi design is like...
subtitles.english: And if you look closely, this Happi design is like...

subtitles.original: ...it's like my raincoat, right?
subtitles.english: ...it's like my raincoat, right?

subtitles.original: And you can see there's Chillers in the front...
subtitles.english: And you can see there's Chillers in the front...

subtitles.original: ...and me on the back. Right?
subtitles.english: ...and me on the back. Right?

subtitles.original: And next, we have this...
subtitles.english: And next, we have this...

subtitles.original: “Jellyfish Princess on the Wall” Tapestry
subtitles.english: “Jellyfish Princess on the Wall” Tapestry

subtitles.original: ..."Jellyfish Princess on the Wall" Tapestry.
subtitles.english: ..."Jellyfish Princess on the Wall" Tapestry.

subtitles.original: It's printed with my brand new birthday illustration.
subtitles.english: It's printed with my brand new birthday illustration.

subtitles.original: It's super high quality and perfect for decorating your wall.
subtitles.english: It's super high quality and perfect for decorating your wall.

subtitles.original: You can wake up and see Kobo's smug face every morning.
subtitles.english: You can wake up and see Kobo's smug face every morning.

subtitles.original: And also don't forget to praise the Lord every day.
subtitles.english: And also don't forget to praise the Lord every day.

subtitles.original: Then look at this...
subtitles.english: Then look at this...

subtitles.original: “Jellyfish Princess, you got this” Button Badge Set
subtitles.english: “Jellyfish Princess, you got this” Button Badge Set

subtitles.original: ...the "Jellyfish Princess, you got this" Button Badge Set.
subtitles.english: ...the "Jellyfish Princess, you got this" Button Badge Set.

subtitles.original: Two pieces.
subtitles.english: Two pieces.

subtitles.original: One has my birthday outfit...
subtitles.english: One has my birthday outfit...

subtitles.original: ...and the other is an illustration I drew by myself.
subtitles.english: ...and the other is an illustration I drew by myself.

subtitles.original: Yeah, by myself.
subtitles.english: Yeah, by myself.

subtitles.original: It looks good, right? Do you like it?
subtitles.english: It looks good, right? Do you like it?

subtitles.original: I drew it by myself.
subtitles.english: I drew it by myself.

subtitles.original: So you can pin them to your bag...
subtitles.english: So you can pin them to your bag...

subtitles.original: ...or your hat, or your heart.
subtitles.english: ...or your hat, or your heart.

subtitles.original: Okay, so this one is one of my favorites.
subtitles.english: Okay, so this one is one of my favorites.

subtitles.original: One, two, three... Ta-da! The plushie keychain!
subtitles.english: One, two, three... Ta-da! The plushie keychain!

subtitles.original: Jellyfish Princess Kobo Plushie Keychain
subtitles.english: Jellyfish Princess Kobo Plushie Keychain

subtitles.original: It's me! But mini Kobo in mini form.
subtitles.english: It's me! But mini Kobo in mini form.

subtitles.original: You can bring me anywhere.
subtitles.english: You can bring me anywhere.

subtitles.original: On your backpack, your keys, your motorcycle, the car, whatever.
subtitles.english: On your backpack, your keys, your motorcycle, the car, whatever.

subtitles.original: Even next to your computer while you watch my streams.
subtitles.english: Even next to your computer while you watch my streams.

subtitles.original: Soft and squishy.
subtitles.english: Soft and squishy.

subtitles.original: And finally, we also have the...
subtitles.english: And finally, we also have the...

subtitles.original: Voice Pack / Situational Voice Pack / “Your One and Only Jellyfish Princess”
subtitles.english: Voice Pack / Situational Voice Pack / “Your One and Only Jellyfish Princess”

subtitles.original: ...Situational Voice Pack.
subtitles.english: ...Situational Voice Pack.

subtitles.original: So it's called "Your One and Only Jellyfish Princess".
subtitles.english: So it's called "Your One and Only Jellyfish Princess".

subtitles.original: What does it mean? Buy it! Buy it, okay?
subtitles.english: What does it mean? Buy it! Buy it, okay?

subtitles.original: Yippee, it's a special voice pack where I talk to you...
subtitles.english: Yippee, it's a special voice pack where I talk to you...

subtitles.original: ...about Jellyfish Princess.
subtitles.english: ...about Jellyfish Princess.

subtitles.original: And you know, your one and only just for you.
subtitles.english: And you know, your one and only just for you.

subtitles.original: Set Purchase Bonus / Autographed instant photo-style card
subtitles.english: Set Purchase Bonus / Autographed instant photo-style card

subtitles.original: If you buy a set of them...
subtitles.english: If you buy a set of them...

subtitles.original: ...you'll get a special bromate with my signature on it.
subtitles.english: ...you'll get a special bromate with my signature on it.

subtitles.original: The merch is available for a limited time only.
subtitles.english: The merch is available for a limited time only.

subtitles.original: So you can grab yours from the official shop.
subtitles.english: So you can grab yours from the official shop.

subtitles.original: Links are in the description.
subtitles.english: Links are in the description.

subtitles.original: So yeah, that's all for the announcement.
subtitles.english: So yeah, that's all for the announcement.

subtitles.original: Thank you for coming and watching Kobo perform today.
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming and watching Kobo perform today.

subtitles.original: 以上、こぼ・かなえるのお知らせでした。
subtitles.english: That concludes the announcements from Kobo Kanaeru.

subtitles.original: 説明欄やチャット欄にリンクを貼ってありますので、
subtitles.english: I've put the links in the description and chat section,

subtitles.original: クリックしてね！
subtitles.english: so please check them out!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, but I can hear some of you want an encore.
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, but I can hear some of you want an encore.

subtitles.original: Encore, encore, encore hoshii?
subtitles.english: Encore, encore, do you want an encore?

subtitles.original: じゃあ、しょうがないわ。
subtitles.english: Well, I guess I have no choice.

subtitles.original: Please listen, Sweet Memories.
subtitles.english: Please listen, Sweet Memories.

subtitles.original: Sweet Memories
subtitles.english: Sweet Memories
